title: When this post is two hours old I will give NA player "Better Jungler" an on-stream spanking
body:
#UPDATE 1PM PST: WINNER REVEALED BELOW

Last week NA noob player "Better Jungler" declared his intention to seek revenge against me, the greatest Silver II Garen jungle main in the world: https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/memes/bEMsqnKE-cactopus-a-public-declaration-of-vendetta-against-you)

I will be giving this player the spanking of a lifetime in a SR 1v1 match (best of three) at 12pm PST today. 

Catch us on this Twitch channel: https://www.twitch.tv/rumtumtumblies

THE RULES OF THE 1V1

- Best of 3
- SR midlane only
- First blood or first to 100 CS
- Recalls allowed
- We will play the same champion, as determined by the random champ selector tool on https://offmeta.com/
- Winner is declared "Boards Jesus"

#UPDATE:

i don't really want to like talk about the details or whatever but Better Jungler is now Boards Jesus

however i am still the greatest silver 2 garen jungle main in the world

BEHOLD, JUSTICE: https://clips.twitch.tv/PiliableSoftAubergineWOOP
